content.title: Funded in just 4 hours—You Made It Happen! 🎉
content.creator:
ChocoDream
March 21, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
We are extremely thankful for your bountiful pledges. They allowed us to achieve the target amount on Kickstarter in merely 4 hours.
  Most importantly, we want to convey our gratitude to each and every individual who lent their support to our project. Your trust and backing have been instrumental in our accomplishment. You not only assisted us in exceeding our goal but also opened up more significant opportunities and potential for our project.
  To show our appreciation to our backers, we would like to acquaint you with Kickbooster & PledgeBoost.
  ( 1 ) Kickbooster
🎁🎁Share & Back for Exclusive Rewards!
1️⃣Become a Booster
2️⃣Share your unique referral link
3️⃣Earn a 15% commission for every pledge made through your link.
( 2 ) PledgeBoost
🎁🎁Share & Back for Exclusive Rewards!
1️⃣Become a Booster
2️⃣Share your unique referral link
3️⃣Earn a 15%  commission for every pledge made through your link.
If you have any questions or feedback, please feel free to reach out to us. Thank you once again for your support!
Best wishes,
ChocoDream Team
